orb site.name: orb site
orb site.description: Gives a link to the Orbios website

orb invite.name: orb invite
orb invite.description: Gives a permanent invite link to Orbios, #rules_and_info

orb roles.name: orb roles
orb roles.description: Lists all roles that can be self-assigned

orb sr.name: orb sr
orb sr.description: Assigns a role if it is from the list

orb custom.name: orb custom
orb custom.description: Sets a custom message for whatever follows it (gn, gm)

orb tournament.name: orb tournament
orb tournament.description: Gives a permanent invite link to the Orbios tournament server

orb puzzle.name: orb puzzle
orb puzzle.description: Gives a link to the puzzle section of the website

orb rprog.name: orb rprog
orb rprog.description: Displays the progress towards obtaining the 'Recruiter' role

join.name: join
join.description: Provides a link so that you can invite me to your server, silly!

server.name: server
server.description: Provides an invite link to my server! :O (yes I have a server)

gs.name: gs
gs.description: Searches google for the secret stuff

ys.name: ys
ys.description: Searches youtube for the really `special` videos you like to watch

myip.name: myip
myip.description: Gives a link to a ip retrieving website (absolutely not an IP grabber)

osu u.name: osu u
osu u.description: Displays details on the specified osu! user... cookiezi-sama :blue_heart:

anime.name: anime
anime.description: Searches for an anime and returns info on it (so you can stroke away at the `actual` plot)

wallpaper.name: wallpaper
wallpaper.description: Searches for a wallpaper with or without the keywords

twitch.name: twitch
twitch.description: Searches for a twitch channel and returns the top result (the one everyone cares about, jk)

encrypt.name: encrypt
encrypt.description: Encrypts the text given (so you too can be extra sneaky... at least for a while)
